title: Pronunciation II: Syllable Stress and Intonation
instruction: Let’s practice syllable stress and rising intonation.

fields.prompt: Where’s the stress in the word ‘teacher’? Say it out loud.
Where’s the stress in the word ‘doctor’? Say it clearly.
Say the word ‘photograph’ with correct stress.
Practice this question with rising intonation: ‘Are you coming today?’

validation_logic.feedback_pass: Nice! Your stress and intonation were accurate.
validation_logic.feedback_fail: Let's practice a bit more to improve stress and tone.
